headline: FICO Launches Cost-Cutting Direct License Program for Mortgage Lending
summary: BOZEMAN, Mont., October 01, 2025--FICO launches FICO® Mortgage Direct License Program, announcing a major shift in the delivery of FICO® Scores to the mortgage industry.

raw.headline: FICO Launches Cost-Cutting Direct License Program for Mortgage Lending

headline: Navicore Solutions supports consumers as new credit scoring rules allow Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) payment histories to impact credit scores
summary: MANALAPAN, N.J., Oct. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Navicore Solutions, a leading national nonprofit credit counseling agency, is urging consumers to take action as FICO prepares to launch new scoring models that will include Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) data for the first time. These scores are expected to be available to lenders starting in fall 2025, marking a significant change in how creditworthiness is measured. BNPL programs such as Affirm, Klarna, and Afterpay have grown rapidly in popularit

headline: FICO Launches Focused Foundation Model for Financial Services with Domain-Specific GenAI
summary: Fair Isaac Corporation (NYSE:FICO) is one of the oversold tech stocks to invest in. On September 23, FICO announced a new suite of domain-specific GenAI models for the financial services industry, collectively called the FICO Focused Foundation Model for Financial Services/FICO FFM. The FFM is engineered to reduce hallucinations and achieve superior accuracy and trust […]
